column4: Real-Time Turning (overrides but does not overwrite all other settings)
Slow to walk when making turns quickly
Threshold for triggering walk in pi
Threshold for triggering a sharp turn check in pi
Timer for sharp turn detection (higher=less detection)
Time in seconds that you are slowed after a sharp turn
Direction switch leniency: If within x(pi), direction switch ends early
Forced walk speed on direction switch (disables multiplier below)
Sets movement speed to speed*x during a sharp turn
These rules apply whenever your turn is within Maximum Turn Angle of your last movement
These rules apply whenever you turn the camera rapidly
These rules apply when Geralt's direction changes rapidly
Out of combat sprint speed multiplier
Out of combat sprinting swim multiplier
